ygData.subject: Re: Elections
ygData.msgSnippet: Alright, first off, a good, sensible and logical council member would never ban a member for no reason. Power abuse, y know. I don t see why LN would ban you

Alright, first off, a good, sensible and logical council member would 
never ban a member for no reason. Power abuse, y'know. I don't see why 
LN would ban you in the first place. I have had differences with LN 
when I arrived, and what differences they were! That did not prevent 
him to send me some ideas that I found good. The point is that you 
think LN would turn is power against you. Like he'd have time for that 
anyways... ;)
